description: Describes the types of vehicles that System operator has available for rent (added in v2.1-RC). According to the Standard GBFS 2.2
title: Smart Data Models adaptation of GBFS standard data model vehicle_types

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be vehicle_types

last_updated.description: Property. Last time the data in the feed was updated in POSIX time.

ttl.description: Property. Number of seconds before the data in the feed will be updated again (0 if the data should always be refreshed).

version.description: Property. GBFS version number to which the feed conforms, according to the versioning framework.

data.description: Property. Response data in the form of name:value pairs.

vehicle_types.description: Array that contains one object per vehicle type in the system as defined below.

vehicle_type_id.description: Unique identifier of a vehicle type.

propulsion_type.description: The primary propulsion type of the vehicle.

max_range_meters.description: The furthest distance in meters that the vehicle can travel without recharging or refueling when it has the maximum amount of energy potential.

name.description: The public name of this vehicle type.
